item.title: New Iran videos show bodies piled in hospital and snipers on roofs
item.description: Footage from a hospital in Tehran shows at least 31 bodies piled inside and seven body bags outside.

item.title: Trump abandons attack mode as Minneapolis shooting backlash grows
item.description: The White House has shifted how it talks about Alex Pretti's killing as more Republicans express concern over the deadly encounter.

item.title: Nigerian officers to face trial over coup-plot allegations
item.description: Following an investigation some of the 16 detained last year are accused of planning to unseat President Bola Tinubu.

item.title: Israel says it has retrieved remains of final Gaza hostage
item.description: Israeli Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu called Ran Gviliâ€™s return "an extraordinary achievement".

item.title: Private jet carrying eight people crashes in Maine
item.description: Poor visibility was reported at the airport during a winter storm that has affected a large swathe of the US.
